CodeEditorModel.Text:
'Code behind Page - Add local subroutines for the page.
Sub ConvertUnit Dim tmp, input As Single Dim txt As String Dim ary() As String
txt = Label_Value_Edit
Try ' Check if string contain / If txt.Contains("/") Then ' Split numerator and denominator ary = txt.Split("/") ' Calculate value input = ary(0) / ary(1) Else ' Convert value input = Label_Value_Edit End If
Catch ex As Exception
S_Popup.MsgBox("Wrong input") End Try
tmp = input * Label_Factor(0)
Output = tmp.ToString(Label_Format(0) ) End Sub
Sub ConvertDate Dim tmpDate As Date
tmpDate = CDate( Date_Input )
Date_Output = tmpDate.ToString( Label_Format(1) )
End Sub
